message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.CR 

This paper addresses the problem of person re-identification, which is a subfield of computer vision. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper proposes a hierarchical feature learning framework that learns invariant representations, which involves machine learning techniques. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) are also likely sub-categories. The paper also evaluates its approach on publicly available datasets, which involves performance evaluation and comparison. Therefore, cs.MM (Multimedia) is another likely sub-category. Finally, the paper addresses the challenges of person re-identification, which involves security and privacy concerns. Therefore, cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) is a less likely but still possible sub-category.
